name: Roll in One
description:
Roll your way to victory in this dice-themed golf arcade game!

You are a disembodied hand - golf glove included. Time your rolls to match the numbers on the flags and rack up points.

Controls

  • Up/down arrows to move hand 
  • Spacebar to roll dice

 Credits

  • Programming: Faisal Fakhro
  • Art: Yasmeen Fakhro
